attributes.review: it would be greatly appreciated if this app was to be removed from within the App Store. me and many others would be relieved. this app is a negative influence to the youth. it causes us harm and brings us what it unwanted for us. thank you.
attributes.title: terrible app.

attributes.review: This app is outstanding 🥳 outstandingly terrifying 🤩✨🧚 I had to burn my phone and pay for therapy after downloading this horrific app. It displayed very graphic images of what seemed to be a HUGE Cheeto wearing a wig. I will never be the same after using this app. I still have nightmares.

I downloaded this app to see all TRUMP 2020 news. But guess what?! GUESS!!! There’s no news. The first thing I saw when I opened the app was Trump x Biden smut??! WHAT!!! Not gonna lie though, that smut was 10/10. But it was not what I came for. If the trump administration wants to post smut they to take it to Wattpad or Archive of our Own.
attributes.title: BAD APP

attributes.review: Okay, first of all this is a horrible app to get like who even would get this in the first place.. yuck. Second off I don’t wanna see that old thing staring at me with his Trump2020 campaign, thank you - NEXT!! This should be taken off the App Store IMMEDIATELY, thank you.
attributes.title: Worst app EVER

attributes.review: Literally this app shut down my phone and I couldn’t turn it back on for a hour I’m so disappointed. The app worked horribly and kept taking me back to my home screen. This is such a bad app please take it down.
attributes.title: Nooo 🙃

attributes.review: This app made me sick! Overall TERRIBLE if I could give 0 star I would!!! Nothing works and this man in these pictures is not cute😡😡😡 I could smell the homophobia and racism through the screen!!! Do not recommend, I think this app needs to get taken down!😡😡😡
attributes.title: 😡😡😡😡 HORRIBLE

attributes.review: I open the app and I see a big Cheeto puff and scream after that I had. To get a therapist and told them everything I showed my therapist the app and she screamed cause we saw the Cheeto puff naked getting a tan we both had to get therapist for are horrible treatment on this app.
attributes.title: Don’t get it

attributes.review: So I thought my life couldn’t get any worse but then I got this and I about died😣 I saw a creepy old man and it scared me tf out and it said it was a rapist and I was like oh hell nah. So I got tf out of that app but I still get nightmares. So unless you wanna get nightmares like me don’t get the app😌
attributes.title: Trump is a joke

attributes.review: This app is the worst app ever it had pictures of children on it Chito Trump and other disgusting things on it when I saw it my screen melted. I’m never buying this app again I am contacting my lawyer because I turned disabled while watching Trump.
attributes.title: Super Terrible app

attributes.review: You tried💅🏼✨don’t try again😍😈👄I was so offended by the name “trump” on my phone screen that I had a panic attack and started crying. Please don’t ever download an app where you see a cheese Cheeto😭😭it wasn’t even a hot Cheeto💔😭
attributes.title: I was looking for my oil💅🏼✨turns out I found it in your hair🎟🩰😍✨
